CustomField.description: Based on owner role copy, used to classify opportunities by sales segment.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE1"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SMB"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SB"), AND( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Fleet IS VP"), CONTAINS(Finance_Segment_Stamp__c,"SMB")), Small_Fleet_Opportunity__c ),"AE1", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IND"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Industrial"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c, "Equipment") ), "Industrial",
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"CNWKR"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Connected"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c, "Sites") ),"Connected Worker",
IF( AND ( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE2"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"MM"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"IS EMEA") ), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Industrial")), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Connected Worker")) ),"AE2",
IF( AND ( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE3"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"MM") ), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Industrial")), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Connected Worker")) ),"AE3",
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Major"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"ENT"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Enterprise"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Field") ),"Enterprise",
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Management"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"EVP"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Operations") ),"Management", IF( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c, "Renewal"), "Renewals", " "))))))))
CustomField.label: Segment (Sales Role)
